data.title: Staci Group
data.meta_description: 55 SITES EN EUROPE STACI s’appuie sur un réseau de 55 sites logistiques en Europe. Cet ensemble, qui représente 600 000 m² de stockage, constitue l’infrastructure à partir de laquelle le Groupe déploie l’ensemble de ses solutions. Ce maillage permet de répondre à l’ensemble des problématiques d’approvisionnement de ses clients nationaux ou internationaux, l’un des […]

Used to remember a user's language setting to ensure that LinkedIn.com is displayed in the language selected by the user in their preferences.pll_language1 yearThis cookie is set by Polylang plugin for WordPress powered websites. The cookie stores the language code of the last browsed page.TS01*sessionThe TS01 cookie helps manage web traffic. It allows load balancing to work: management of user traffic with respect to servers.viewed_cookie_policy11 monthsThe cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data.wpc_*1 daywpc_* cookies are deposited by the WP Cerber plugin. their purpose is to secure the site by detecting and mitigating malicious activity (Anti spam). No personal data is stored in these cookies._pk_id.*1 year 27 daysMatomo by default uses first-party cookies, set on the domain of the site. Cookies created by Matomo start with: _pk_ref, _pk_cvar, _pk_id, _pk_ses. See a list of all Matomo cookies : https://matomo.org/faq/general/faq_146/ _pk_ses.*30 minutesThis Matomo cookie stores a unique session ID. Matomo by default uses first-party cookies, set on the domain of the site. Cookies created by Matomo start with: _pk_ref, _pk_cvar, _pk_id, _pk_ses.
